Uses of Class
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.cache.Persistence.PersistenceException

  • Packages that use Persistence.PersistenceException 
    Package Description
    com.smartnsoft.droid4me.bo
    The definition of business objects used inside the framework.
    com.smartnsoft.droid4me.cache
    Contains some caching features, based on RAM or/and the SD card (persistence) of the terminal.
